turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I'm trying to schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez, but the online system is giving me fits. It keeps saying there are no available slots, which I find hard to believe. Can you help?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Let me check Dr. Ramirez's schedule for you. Can you please provide your full name and date of birth so I can locate your patient profile?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's Jane Doe, and my birthday is 01/15/1988. I need this appointment to discuss some lab results, so it's kind of important. Is there any way to get in sooner if something opens up?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Ms. Doe. I see Dr. Ramirez has an opening on October 27th at 2:30 PM. Alternatively, there's November 8th at 10:00 AM. I can also add you to a waitlist and notify you if an earlier appointment becomes available. Would you prefer either of those scheduled times, or should I add you to the waitlist?
